environment_variables.SLURM_JOBID: The ID of the current Slurm job
environment_variables.SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID: The ID of the current task in a Slurm array
environment_variables.SINGULARITY_ALLOWED_DIR: The directory where the Singularity image is located
environment_variables.hf_dir: The directory of the Hiveformer project
environment_variables.seed: The random seed for the experiment
environment_variables.name: The name of the experiment
environment_variables.valset: The directory of the validation dataset
environment_variables.args: Additional arguments for the training script
